title: Catalytic asymmetric carbenoid α-C–H insertion of ether
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15167-15177
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02206H, Review Article
Open Access

Xin Li, San-Hong Yue, Zi-Yang Tan, Shu-Bo Liu, De-Xiang Luo, Ying-Jun Zhou, Xiao-Wei Liang
Significant advancements have been made in catalytic asymmetric α-C–H bond functionalization of ethers via carbenoid insertion over the past decade.
